txt.en: Use the ancient anvil
Speak to Perimbant
<rgb=#FF0000>Bonfire Doused ([placeholder]/6)</rgb>
Defeated veteran guardsmen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated the Dunlending captain
Private Instance: Midnight Raid
You have created an empowered adamant

Unbeknownst to the Dunlendings in Eregion, their largest camp has been built upon an ancient Elf-forge where some of the finest weapons of the early Third Age were once wrought. In order to gain access to this forge, Perimbant has devised a daring plan to raid the camp via the river by moonlight, sneaking in to overcome the guards and set fire to much of the camp, scattering the unsuspecting defenders in the chaos of battle and flame.
The bonfire has been doused by a Desperate Soldier!
The bonfire has been doused by a Desperate Soldier!
'Quite the display you showed here, my friends. The Dunlendings will not soon forgive you for your deeds here tonight.'
You must weaken the camp's response to your attack by ambushing and eliminating a number of their veteran guardsman before the main phase of the assault begins.
'Are you ready to return to Echad Dúnann then?'
Grab torches from the bonfire in the centre of the Dunlanding camp and set fire to as many tents as possible in order to create panic and disorder.
You must find and defeat the Dunlending captain before he can rally his troops to fight off your assault.
Use the ancient forge to empower your infused adamant.
Speak with Perimbant to return to Echad Dúnann.
Defeat veteran guardsmen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Take a brand from the bonfire
Burn the Dunlendings' tents
Burned tents ([placeholder]/40)
Instance: Midnight Raid
Defeat the Dunlending captain
